snippet: With the closing of the polls on Tuesday night, what could turn out to be the last battle over the Confederate battle flag in Mississippi has begun in earnest.
abstract: Dispute over whether to remove Confederate battle flag from public places that has flared following massacre of black churchgoers in Charleston is complicated in Mississippi by presence of battle flag on upper left corner of state flag; efforts are underway to remove Confederate flag from state flag, but majority of state residents favor keeping it there.
lead_paragraph: With the closing of the polls on Tuesday night, what could turn out to be the last battle over the Confederate battle flag in Mississippi has begun in earnest.

headline.main: Mississippi Flag, a Rebel Holdout, Is in a New Fight
headline.print_headline: Flag Protesters Set Their Sights on Mississippi

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
